sentences.sContent: Replace the refrigerant line between the compressor and condenser.
sentences.sContent_eng: Replace the refrigerant line between the compressor and condenser.
sentences.sCn: 更换压缩机与冷凝器之间的制冷剂管路。

sentences.sContent: Some new reactors that now use condensers have other design changes that make the condenser more appropriate, he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some new reactors that now use condensers have other design changes that make the condenser more appropriate, he said.
sentences.sCn: 他说，目前使用冷凝器的部分新反应堆也做了其他设计上的变更，使冷凝器更加适用。

sentences.sContent: It consists of a compressor, a condenser, a throttle or expansion valve, an evaporator, and a working fluid (refrigerant).
sentences.sContent_eng: It consists of a compressor, a condenser, a throttle or expansion valve, an evaporator, and a working fluid (refrigerant).
sentences.sCn: 它由压缩机、冷凝器、节流阀或膨胀阀、蒸发器，以及一种工作流体（冷冻剂）组成。

synos.tran: 冷凝器；[电]电容器；[光]聚光器

trans.tranOther: a piece of equipment that changes a gas into a liquid
